title: 272.17 LIST OF CERTIFICATES OF SALE FILED WITH AUDITOR.
text: On February first of each year, the county recorder and registrar of titles shall make out from the records and file with the county auditor a list of all sheriff's or referee's certificates of sale on execution or foreclosure of mortgages, upon which the period of redemption has expired during the preceding year. The county auditor shall thereupon make the proper entries upon the transfer records and tax lists to conform with the list so filed.
